product_description: XIYAOXI 120Pcs Colors Flat Push Pins – your go-to solution for organizing, displaying and creating across every aspect of daily life. With 120 pieces per set, this ample supply ensures you never run out when tackling tasks, decorating spaces or bringing DIY ideas to life. A. Each thumb tack is thoughtfully constructed with a steel core coated in gold for durability, paired with a smooth Colors plastic cap that combines functionality with a clean, versatile look. The 10 mm / 0.4 inches flat head offers a secure grip for easy pressing, while the 8 mm / 0.31 inches sharp steel tip glides through soft materials without bending, making insertion and removal hassle-free for all users. B. A key highlight of these Colors push pins is their fade-resistant plastic caps. Unlike coated alternatives, the Colors color stays bright and true over time, maintaining a polished appearance whether used on bulletin boards in classrooms, cork boards in offices or wall displays in dorms. The included transparent plastic storage box keeps all thumb tacks organized, preventing loss and clutter in drawers or on desks – a simple detail that boosts productivity and saves time. C. Designed for versatility, these flat thumb tacks adapt to countless scenarios. Use them to pin photos in your dorm room, display student work in classrooms, organize documents in offices, mark locations on maps or secure materials for DIY crafts. They work seamlessly with a range of surfaces, including cork, foam, poster board, fabric, bulletin boards, calendars and more, making them a must-have for homes, schools, galleries and creative spaces. Specifications: a. Color - Colors; b. Quantity - 120 Pcs; c. Material - Steel (gold-coated) with Colors plastic caps; d. Tip Length - 8 mm / 0.31 Inches; Head Diameter - 10 mm / 0.4 Inches. Note: Keep out of reach of children to prevent injury from sharp tips. Handle with care during insertion and removal to avoid punctures or damage to surfaces.
